body: I am getting ready to purchase a second bottle and thought I would write a review. My wife suffers from generalized anxiety disorder which started one day out of nowhere and was having trouble finding ways to cope through it. She was placed on all types of psychotropic medications and all they did was turn her into a numb zombie and caused horrible side effects. It got to the point where she had to quit her job, was scared to drive or grocery shop and even to stay alone with our children. She would call for emergency assistance at least once a week because her heart rate would go up to almost 200 beats per minute, she'd get dizzy and her chest would hurt really badly when having an attack. It was horrible and causing a ton of stress on her heart. After doing some research, we came across an article about natural solutions to cure anxiety. L-Theanine was on the list. I purchased this brand because of the good reviews in June and she would take 2-3 a day. It helped a lot but she still had trouble with staying out of sudden fight or flight mode. Two weeks later, she added chelated magnesium 133mg, 5-HTP 100mg, vitamin D-3 w/coconut oil 5,000iu, and lithium orotate 5mg. Along with practicing relaxation techniques, she takes one of each pill in the morning and its been like a miracle. She is back to her old self again and more focused and energetic. She has been off all her psychotropic medications and has not had a unmanageable attack in over a month. No more racing heart, dizziness, and countless er and doctor visits. Later, we also found out that she had an severely infected root canal that she did not even feel and that may have been the culprit as she's always been a very laidback person all her life so her sudden change just did not make sense to either of us. Infections causes your body to become under a lot of stress so take care of yourselves and don't just take an anxiety diagnosis with a grain of salt. Once it starts, it is a beast to contend with but there's always a root cause. Work on the figuring out the root causes and if you can, leave the psychotropic medications alone because they only cover up the real issue(s).
title: Life Changing!

body: Definitely calming!! I'm a naturally irritated person. I was born irritated and have a insanely low tolerance for stupid. The only problem is that it's so calming I now have to take it before bed, but I'm sleeping so much better so I can't complain. I tried to take it in the morning with my coffee but I ended up looking and feeling sedated so that's probably not the best idea for work lol I can sometimes be a delicate flower when taking new things so I'm sure my sedation was my body just being dramatic

body: I am a woman in my late twenties that has had issues with anxiety and depression since childhood, making it very hard for me to become motivated to do simple things like chores or to interact with others. Last year was especially difficult for me after receiving a promotion at work and by the summer it reached a point of where I decided that something needed to be done for the sake of my health. I tried going through my healthcare plan first to seek treatment but the amount of hurdles in the way just to get a prescription were incredibly discouraging and time-consuming. After four months, I was fed up with the lack of progress being made and decided to look into alternatives instead. A friend of mine who has social anxiety disorder suggested I look into nootropics and, after a few weeks of reading up on various supplements, I put my doubts aside and decided that a L-Theanine and 5-HTP combo looked the most promising. I ordered one bottle of this along with two bottles of 5-HTP in mid- December and started taking both supplements the week of Christmas.

body: Small football shaped gel caps that go down well and don't get lodged.  No flavor or taste.  This supplement is one I will not go without.  MAJOR effectiveness.  Was advised to take by my herbalist for my high blood pressure that I have in the mornings & early afternoons so I can sleep deeper and not wake up stressed.  Apparently many of us have this phenomenon of high pressure during the early parts of the day but relax and normal pressure as the day winds down. Pharmacy prescription drugs are hard on us because they don't back off your system when the BP is naturally backing off so we get very low BP in the later part of the day.  Which brings about lethargy, tired muscles, etc.
title: Wont go without this supplement.

body: I was first introduced to L-theanine by my doctor who suggested I give it a try and see if it would help with my anxiety and insomnia, so I purchased a bottle from their office. It did help a good bit as long as I took three caps a day. However, buying it from the doctor’s office was a bit pricey, so I went to the local health store and bought a cheaper well know brand, which didn’t seem to help much. Then I came across the “SportsResearch” brand on Amazon and thought I’d give it a try based on the positive reviews (usually too many positive reviews and no negative ones, in my mind, can mean only one of two things, either this stuff is as good as the reviews say it is or there’s a whole lot of fake reviews). Well…I’m glad I gave it a try. I find it works better than the brand the doctor sells. Taking one cap in the morning and one in the evening keeps me feeling relaxed and more focused during the day and I sleep much better at night. Also, love the easy to swallow gel caps.
title: Good stuff!!!

body: I've had an anxiety disorder for 20 years. I do my best to control it without medication. My tricks work for the most part during the day but anxiety frequently disturbs my sleep. A friend of mine recommended I try L-theanine. After research, I decided to try this brand. I've tried many natural remedies for anxiety over the years so I wasn't expecting a whole lot. But I was pleasantly surprised. It doesn't make you drowsy and won't fix insomnia. But I definitely felt calmer and more settled. And after a week or so, I noticed the quality of my sleep had improved. Anxiety wasn't waking me up multiple times per night. I'm very pleased with this product and it surprised me. I shared some with 3 other friends so I'm back for a refill early! It's not a miracle pill. But it is definitely gentle to your system and an effective aide in relaxing for sleep. I love that I can take it before bed on an empty stomach.
title: Helps anxiety sufferers settle for sleep

body: This didn't work for me. I work out (weights/jog), maintain a healthy weight and eat a lot of organic veges. I don't take ANY prescription meds--NONE! I do a lot of things to maintain my health and get yearly physicals. I'm in great health. With all that said, I took this item a few times, once daily and in the morning on an empty stomach. One morning while checking my email, I felt this very odd, panic-like sensation. I actually thought I was having a heart attack. My pulse was racing and I had this helpless sensation. I had to get up and move, frantically walking around thinking I was about to pass out . I was waiting for my heart to stop. Yes, this was the scariest moment of my life! The only difference in everything I've done up to this point was this supplement. I grabbed some organic beat tablets and drank a whole lot of water to flush my system. As I write this, I can still feel that sensation creeping up, then going away, but to a lesser degree. Had I not been flushing my system all morning, in all honesty, I think I'd be in the emergency room. This affected me to the extreme.

body: My mother suffers from anxiety to the point that she could not leave her house to travel 8 minutes to her job in a pretty quiet town. After taking L-Theanine, she changed. At first it was a really strange feeling to describe because I would have a huge exam the next day and usually I would be freaking out and trying to rush around to get things done as fast as possible so I could go study somewhere. Then when I studied I would be stressed about not having enough time to memorize everything. I think this made it even harder for me to retain the information. After taking L-T, I thought for awhile that maybe I didn't care about making good grades because the anxiety was gone! I've always associated caring with anxiety. I love L-Theanine and I take one of these in the morning with some coffee before my normal vitamins. I def recommend to people that need help focusing or suffer from excessive stress or anxiety. body: I could not be more pleased with this product.  Its effect is subtle -- I did not notice any feelings of euphoria, or feel that my problems had "gone away."  But I was significantly more focused, and I seemed to enjoy things more intensely.  Made a 5-hr. drive from St. Louis to Chicago and found that the relatively flat (boring) scenery on that route was more enjoyable than I had ever found it before.  Reading, and remembering what I read, is also significantly improved.  My advice, to get the full effect, would be to take this on an empty stomach and wait at least 30 minutes before eating.  It may be overkill, but if I need to be fully focused all day long, I take two, 200-mg tablets, three times a day, for a daily total of 1200 milligrams.  If I'm spending a leisurely day at home, I take two, 200-mg tablets, twice a day, with the second dose about an hour before bedtime, since this stuff helps me to sleep well and wake up rested, without a groggy feeling.  Thanks, Sports Research!
title: Much Better Than the Prescription Stuff

body: My difficulty with this product is that I honestly can't tell if it's working. Some days I am so anxious I can feel my body jittering, I get insomnia, I get heart palpitations, my bowels act up, and I fixate on depressing thoughts. L-theanine was recommended to me by a friend who has worked in supplement shops for almost a decade now. He recommended me a different product, but I decided to go with this one based on the reviews (and admittedly the branding was nicer on this one). But as I've said it's hard to see any MAJOR changes to my behavior. It's SOOO subtle that I don't know how accurately I can rate this product. Some things I have noticed, but can't tell if it's just circumstantial: I don't seem to be fixating as much; sleeping is a little easier, but not much easier; I still feel jittery. Someone in the comments said one capsule seems to last about 45 minutes. Again, it's not clear how long it's lasting. I've managed to take two at a time on some days, and I still don't see a significant difference overall. Some people also say caffeine gives this a nice boost, but I don't drink coffee or caffeinated teas. So... overall, just not sure about this.
title: Unsure of its effects...

body: I've had an anxiety disorder for 20 years. I do my best to control it without medication. My tricks work for the most part during the day but anxiety frequently disturbs my sleep. A friend of mine recommended I try L-theanine. After research, I decided to try this brand. I've tried many natural remedies for anxiety over the years so I wasn't expecting a whole lot. But I was pleasantly surprised. It doesn't make you drowsy and won't fix insomnia. But I definitely felt calmer and more settled. And after a week or so, I noticed the quality of my sleep had improved. Anxiety wasn't waking me up multiple times per night. I'm very pleased with this product and it surprised me. I shared some with 3 other friends so I'm back for a refill early! It's not a miracle pill. But it is definitely gentle to your system and an effective aide in relaxing for sleep. I love that I can take it before bed on an empty stomach.
title: Helps anxiety sufferers settle for sleep

body: I have taken other L-theanine products and decided to try Sports Research brand when they had a sale on their products.  L-theanine is the active chemical in green tea that acts as a soother against stress.  At least that's what I use it for, like botox for the body.  It helps me manage those emotional peaks and valleys of the day. I took this product first thing in the morning and had no problems with it.  I felt it really helped to keep me emotionally level and will definitely re-order again.

body: This stuff works! I have very high anxiety issues and I have been fighting this problem for about 3 years. I have tried prescription anxiety meds and they were the worst! This is the first supplement that actually chills me out without shutting me down or making me feel crazy. I recommend going easy on the first dose by alternating days on and off and starting on a weekend with a blanket and a pillow. It just makes you so calm you want to just relax and not get much done. I sleep like a rock with this also. The nerves buzzing all over has gone down significantly as well. This feels like it is the opposite of caffeine. I tried another brand but did not feel the effects like this brand. I wish this came in 100 mg doses. I think the 200 mg is too much for me but man does it work.
title: This stuff works!

body: Very Effective! My husband takes this while studying in Medical School (year 3) and can focus for 8-10hrs! His professors recommended it. It's also somewhat of an anti-depressant, decreasing anxiety via increasing dopamine reception (the pre-curser to epinephrine)... basically increasing all the happy chemicals/neurotransmitters in your brain. It is more effective if taken with caffeine. We both take the recommended dosage of 1x/day, but L-theanine has a half-life of 4 hours so if you want to take more...you'll need to space it out at least that much for it to work.
title: Yes!!

body: Contains Suntheanine®, the most reliable standardized brand of theanine. 200 mg strength instead of the more common 150 mg. Made in the USA with a full money back guarantee. I have used various theanine products over the years. Most come in the form of a capsule which contains powdered theanine. Capsules like these are more likely to lose potency from exposure to air or dampness. Theanine is also fat-soluble, not water soluble. SR's delivers its theanine inside a sturdy sealed gel-like capsule in a coconut oil carrier. When considering the price of a theanine supplement, you must consider how much of the theanine will actually be absorbed and available to the body. SR packages its theanine in a way that guarantees an optimal dosage. I have been an avid supplements user for many years and I carefully research any product before buying. SR's reputation is unmatched. Their attention to detail and concern for their customers is evident in everything from their innovative formulas to their modern and classy packaging. You won't go wrong with any of their products.

Was advised to take by my herbalist for my high blood pressure that I have in the mornings & early afternoons so I can sleep deeper and not wake up stressed.  Apparently many of us have this phenomenon of high pressure during the early parts of the day but relax and normal pressure as the day winds down. Pharmacy prescription drugs are hard on us because they don't back off your system when the BP is naturally backing off so we get very low BP in the later part of the day.  Which brings about lethargy, tired muscles, etc.

I have been going on a lot of interviews lately and I notice that I am much more relaxed and my responses are more concise when I take this product. Lastly, I noticed that I wake up more refreshed and a greater desire to get out of bed right away as opposed to hitting the snooze button 5 times.

body: Contains Suntheanine®, the most reliable standardized brand of theanine. 200 mg strength instead of the more common 150 mg. Made in the USA with a full money back guarantee. I have used various theanine products over the years. Most come in the form of a capsule which contains powdered theanine. Capsules like these are more likely to lose potency from exposure to air or dampness. Theanine is also fat-soluble, not water soluble. SR's delivers its theanine inside a sturdy sealed gel-like capsule in a coconut oil carrier. When considering the price of a theanine supplement, you must consider how much of the theanine will actually be absorbed and available to the body. SR packages its theanine in a way that guarantees an optimal dosage. I have been an avid supplements user for many years and I carefully research any product before buying. SR's reputation is unmatched. Their attention to detail and concern for their customers is evident in everything from their innovative formulas to their modern and classy packaging. You won't go wrong with any of their products.
title: Great product and 200 mg strength

body: Very Effective! My husband takes this while studying in Medical School (year 3) and can focus for 8-10hrs! His professors recommended it. It's also somewhat of an anti-depressant, decreasing anxiety via increasing dopamine reception (the pre-curser to epinephrine)... basically increasing all the happy chemicals/neurotransmitters in your brain. It is more effective if taken with caffeine. We both take the recommended dosage of 1x/day, but L-theanine has a half-life of 4 hours so if you want to take more...you'll need to space it out at least that much for it to work.

body: I have been taking theanine since march and it has for the most part helped with my anxiety. I first began with the brand Bluebonnet and it worked for the most part but when i ran out i decided to try a new brand since this one got such great reveiws why not. At first i felt it gave me a great relax feeling but im not sure if that was also due to the fact i had a couple of beers that day too. I stopped taking the pill due to surgery on a friday and began it again on Tuesday when i started getting anxiety again. Again im not sure if this was a coincidence or not but when i took it for the second day on an empty stomach , a couple of hours later my anxiety was at an all time high and i felt horrible! Had to leave work early and lay in bed till i finally fell asleep after 12 midnight. I was exhausted and had some of the weirdest dreams and barely slept.  So i decided i will go back to bluebonnet with hopes it was just this brand.
title: I first began with the brand Bluebonnet and it worked for the most part but when i ran out i decided to try a new brand since th

body: I bought this for my teenage daughter to help with anxiety, rather than putting her on prescription drugs. It works very well for her.  She takes one in the morning before school, and on really stressful days, she'll take another.  It helps at bedtime to calm her mind down, but find that it works best at nighttime in conjunction with other natural remedies.  My husband and I took it when we were in the middle of a very stressful cross-country move, and found I was not so wound up and able to handle things better. I chose this brand because I liked the addition of the coconut oil and beeswax.  Highly recommended for general anxiety as well as when life gets a little stressful.
title: Great for anxiety and stress

body: Been using L-Theanine for a few years now and this stuff is very effective. Really helps me in stressful situations. Definitely would recommend giving it a shot.
title: Great anti-anxiety supplement

body: This stuff works! I have very high anxiety issues and I have been fighting this problem for about 3 years. I have tried prescription anxiety meds and they were the worst! This is the first supplement that actually chills me out without shutting me down or making me feel crazy. I recommend going easy on the first dose by alternating days on and off and starting on a weekend with a blanket and a pillow. It just makes you so calm you want to just relax and not get much done. I sleep like a rock with this also. The nerves buzzing all over has gone down significantly as well. This feels like it is the opposite of caffeine. I tried another brand but did not feel the effects like this brand. I wish this came in 100 mg doses. I think the 200 mg is too much for me but man does it work.
title: This stuff works!

body: I used to buy L-Theanine from another manufacturer. But I think this is better quality and easier to swallow. Will definitely purchase again.

body: I've been experiencing some pretty intense anxiety in my life lately due to a lot of stress (layoffs at work, graduate school, family life, wrecking my car, etc).  I went to the Dr. to check my options, where my Heart Rate is normally 60 BPM it has been at 100 BPM.  I have had the shakes, the tight chest, breathing has been a little labored, very edgy and irritable, and I cry over EVERYTHING ALL THE TIME (I litterally cried over a dead pigeon in my parking garage at one point!).
title: This stuff is an all Natural MIRACLE!

body: I started taking this under the suggestion of a friend when I was in some sort of emotional "funk". I am a full-time graduate student, with an infant, a very successful home business, and also work in real estate. There was a high-stress level daily and I found myself becoming very easily irritated. After about a month of being on the Suntheanine, I feel like I leveled out a lot and was able to be more objective and calm, even when things were a bit chaotic. I do take it on an empty stomach first thing in the morning as recommended, and it doesn't cause me any issues. No upset stomach, heartburn, or sour feelings. I take it with plenty of water and give it about twenty to thirty minutes before I eat. So far I've seen no adverse affects and really enjoy the product. I will continue using it.
title: Helps keep me zen

body: It made me too alert to sleep even though my body was tired and it was late. I used to sleep at 9pm however with this supplement I stay a wake till 2am!! For maximum 4 hours a day, I have been focused but sometimes I need a nap and try to for an hour but couldn't.

body: I am in love with this product. I have high anxiety and just thinking about anxiety gives me anxiety. Mine includes tight spaces, certain colors on walls, and the fear of my head being covered or locked down, I can't even let my boyfriend put his arm around me in bed unless it is just at my waist and even then not a full hug, I also sleep opposite from him as in I'm down by his feet with my head facing the open door. Crazy right?!?! I use to spend hours just thinking about all this stuff and not be able to sleep. I also have Crohn's disease and my stomach gurgles keep me up. I can't honestly say I see like an angel and wake up happy instead of feeling drunk from the things I previously took. My boyfriend can tell the difference too!!!! So excited to try the primrose next!

body: I have been taking L-Theanine for a dozen years or more. I can tell you from personal experience, not all L-Theanine supplements are created equal. Quality matters! That's exactly what you get with this product. Suntheanine® is the only L-Theanine preparation known to be 100% L-Theanine. Other formulations may contain up to 50% D-theanine, a non-psychoactive isomer. I have found those ineffective. I take it in the morning and found it most effective when taken on an empty stomach.  It does not work as a sleep aid for me,  I would also take an additional one during the day if I felt stressed and it helped. I find it keeps me feeling more peaceful in general, which improves my mood and helps me to focus more. Note: I WAS NOT compensated for this review. However, when I opened my purchased box, there is an invitation from Sports Research for a free bottle to be sent to you if you choose to write a review and  they send you a free bottle (of any of their products) as a thank you.
title: Suntheanine® L-Theanine  improves my mood and helps me to focus more

body: After searching for a natural way to reduce my anxiety, I discovered L-Theanine. I don't take it everyday, just on the days that I know will be anxiety-inducing or overwhelming. Overall I feel more calm, less physically uncomfortable, and more at ease. If you plan on taking 2 (400 mg), then absolutely drink it with a cup of coffee or caffeinated tea. I find that the effects are even stronger with caffeine; you feel more focused and "zen" without racing thoughts; I am less easily distracted from the task at hand. It is NOT like xanax if that is what you are thinking, it is far less groggy and spacey, just mostly a mellow effect. Would be great for sleep if you get anxiety before going to bed. Definitely worth a try if you are looking for all natural ways of reducing your anxiety!
title: Surprisingly, this stuff actually works

body: Suntheanine® L-Theanine 200mg. by Sports Research works great to calm my body and quiet my mind. The organic coconut oil is a superior delivery system for the l-theanine which promotes deep relaxation in a matter of minutes (about 10 to 15). When I take Suntheanine® L-Theanine in the daytime, I feel relaxed, calm and focused. When I take it at bedtime, I'm able to drift off to sleep without the restless tossing and turning I used to experience at the end of a busy day. I'm very happy with this product and I will be buying it again. It's a cut above at double the potency. The fact that Sports Research has made this non-GMO and gluten-free is simply icing on the cake.
title: Suntheanine® L-Theanine 200 mg Promotes Deep Relaxation in Minutes

body: I suffer from extreme anxiety and agoraphobia.  I'm currently taking klonopin which barely helps at all.  I just received my L-Theanine today and took 1 200mg capsule.  Within 20 minutes I was much calmer, focused, and my anxiety had lessened.  I felt so good that I actually drove my car to Walmart (driving and walmart are two things that drive my anxiety sky high).  I spent about an hour in there looking around and shopping calm as a zen monk.  I could feel my anxiety coming on a bit, but it was a 2/10 versus the normal full blown freakout mode of 10/10.
title: Anxiety under control

body: I just received these last week and so far I am very impressed.  For reference, I'm a 32 year old male who was born with anxiety.  I've been taking one in the morning, and another at night, both about 30 minutes before my meals.  The effects for me are very apparent and at first were a bit intense, but pleasant.  It gives me a very calm sensation in my body and mind.  I've already come across a few situations in the past week which normally would have caused me to go to a high state of anxiety. However, I was able to manage it much easier and with a clear mind.  Another big bonus, is that when taken at night, especially on the nights that I exercise, I am so much more ready for bed.  I have never been one that's able to doze off on the couch, but these make it quite easy to do.  It's not a drowsy type of feeling, it's just that my brain is more calm with less thoughts shuffling through, so I start dozing.
title: Awesome for my anxiety and some other tips

body: This stuff is gold, people, GOLD! I always had a hard time sleeping until I tried this stuff. Combine this with magnesium and you're good to go for a wonderful nights' rest. I am so thankful for hearing about this product and discovering that Now Foods sells it online. I have never seen it in a store so this is the best place to find it. The price is also fair for what you're getting. It's easy to swallow as it's not too big. I take it about 20 minutes before bed so I'm ready to go to slip into a deep sleep. I recommend this to anybody who is having trouble sleeping. Just do it.
title: Amazing product!

body: I often have difficulty maintaining sleep.  As I do not want to wake up and take a sleeping medicine, which would make me "hungover" in the morning, I instead take L-Theanine/Inositol 200 mg/100 mg (one capsule) to help me drift back to sleep.
title: Works well for my insomnia, maybe it can help you too

body: I don't usually leave reviews, but I cannot say enough about how much this product has helped me. I have been taking this for about 1 1/2 months and can tell a great difference in myself. I am able to go to sleep easier and faster at night, it helps me to let the small stuff go that I used to needlessly stress myself out over, and I just have a better general felling of well-being.  I work a high stress job, police dispatcher, and wish I knew about this years ago. I feel the L-Theanine just kind of calms your brain down to let your body do what it is supposed to. An unexpected side-effect for me personally is it seems to have helped my libido to reappear after several years of struggling, for which my husband is very thankful. I haven't changed anything else during this same time period and this is the only thing I can link it to. Stress seems to be the number one killer of libido for women, and it definitely was for me. Hopefully this will continue to work for me.

She takes it when she's having a rough day and I find that this helps me settle down enough to fall asleep. This is a great product and I've had no problems with the packaging or the capsules themselves. They don't smell bad or really like anything at all which is a problem I've had with other stinky supplements.
title: Good clean product

body: I was originally taking 100mg of L-Theanine from another brand, but decided to give this one a try as my anxiety has slowly been increasing so the affordable price at a slightly higher dosage was a no brainer. The one thing I am noticing is that it doesn't make me feel as calm as the other brands, my anxiety goes away for the most part but I still get that "elephant sitting on your chest" feeling throughout the day. I've taken it for a week or so now and usually take it in the afternoon (morning for me, I work nights) so I am going to try taking it with my L-Tryptophan before I go to sleep at night and see if that gives me any change. Some of the other reviews have stated that it takes longer to "kick in" so perhaps it isn't kicking in until after I fall asleep at night since I take it mid to late afternoon. I'll be sure to update the review if I notice any changes when taking it at night.
title: Good value, I recommend it if it's is your first time trying to see if L-Theanine works for you, everyone's body is different.

body: This is the best product since sliced bread.  I have many clients and friends on anti-depressants and I get them off it as soon as I can.  Now having said that, If you were on serious SSRI's this stuff only takes the edge off until that junk is out of your system and your receptors are down regulated.  After that this stuff works just as good.  I take this when I feel a panic attack coming on of if I enter a fearful situation and it calms me right down.  If I want it to work faster, I pop open the capsule and throw the powder in my mouth... It tastes like weak sugar, slightly sweet, but it works in one minute if I do that.  Also adding this to melatonin when you have insomnia.... THE BOMB!  meaning the sleeping bomb!  LOOOOVE IT!  I give it to my kids and their friends too.  Helped one friend through an exam.  No side effects, all natural... How much better can it get than that?  Adjust the dose as needed.  I need two during a panic attack, but one is good if I have mild anxiety.  Two at bedtime with melatonin during the occasional insomnia.
title: THE BOMB!

body: This product is good to help with phobias and with anxiety. Also, if you can't handle MSG, this is helpful with that.  Apparently, we have a lot of glutamate that is added to modern foods, so you need theanine to break down glutamate into GABA, which makes you feel happy and peaceful.  Too much glutamate is not good for the brain, and if you don't have theanine to break it down into peaceful GABA, what happens?  You can have anxiety, phobias, panic disorder, and general brain derangement.  My daughter  recommended this product to me.  I'm glad I got it, and I'm recommending it to my other daughter.  What price can you put on a peaceful happy mind.  There is so much MSG (monosodium glutamate) added to every food you can imagine.  They have 50 ways of hiding it.  My solution has been to eat food as close to natural as possible, cook at home more, because you mostly get msg in fast food, restaurant food and in other highly processed foods.
title: My daughter recommended this to me!

body: I started taking Theanine to help with insomnia.  I had not found anything that worked significantly and my doctor was unhelpful.  I had tested high in Cortisol using the saliva test and suspected this had something to do with the insomnia.  I was waking up almost every night at 3 am when I did fall asleep and I was burning up and my knee joints hurt. Theanine is supposed to lower cortisol by increasing GABA .  I had tried other Amazon supplements that were supposed to lower Cortisol to little effect.  I started taking Theanine in the evening  and the waking up at 3 AM and the burning up stopped.  the joint pain stopped also.  I was also having an easier time falling asleep in the evening.  I take blood pressure medicine but it only lowers it to the high normal range.  I measure my blood pressure twice a day normally.  I noticed after taking my evening theanine, in 30 min after taking it my BP went from 152/84 to 138/76.  After a week my knees felt better than they have in a year.  i started taking this stuff twice a day now,  I am going to experiment with lower dosages more frequently and see how that works out.
title: Great for  insomnia and apparently lowering Cortisol

body: I rescue Cocker Spaniels and my vet suggested 50mg Suntheanine am/pm to help with canine anxiety.  I was skeptical,  but it does work!  It takes 7 to 14 days to build up in the system,  but definitely takes the edge off.  It does not change personality or sedate the dog,  but I have noticed happier,  more relaxed,  more playful pups,  who are showing fewer nervous tics and are more open to training and redirection.  It's a great first step for dogs who just need a little help.
title: It works!

The beginning of 2015 I was reading again about the anxiolytic effects of L-Theanine and proceeded to buy Doctor's Best off of amazon. body: L-Theanine is a great supplement for 2 purposes - relaxation (anti-anxiety, sleep) and memory.  I feel like this helps me remember things better when I'm studying.  Especially when paired with caffeine, there is a lot of research that shows a beneficial effect from L-Theanine on learning and memory.  While nothing like a benzodiazepine, this will help you relax.  If you have trouble sleeping at night, it will probably help.  If you have nervous tension during the day, it will probably help.  Again, its not a miracle, but I am sure it will help.  All in all, I think this is a good supplement.

body: L-theanine is one of my favorite supplements. Before being diagnosed with thyroid issues several years ago, my heart would race like a washing machine off balance. I had anxiety that was affecteing me terribly. I began taking 1 or 2 L-theanine pills before bed and it worked perfectly! Finally I could rest! Later I also learned that it was good for caffeine sensitivity.  After drinking coffee I would feel very jittery and as if I was having low-blood sugar. I took one of these pills and wah-lah! It worked! Actually, the combination of a cup of coffee and 1 l-theanine makes you steady and able to concentrate better! I used this method when I went back to school ( in my mid-life years.) I have found that anytime I take something that makes me jittery or I feel anxious, L-theanine proves to be just the thing! My husband uses it and it lowers his blood pressure! So, yes, I have to say that this has to be my favorite, most widely used supplement. Be blessed, all!😊
title: My favorite supplement!

body: I read reviews on all my supplements that I buy and I see more and more people calling for the government to regulate the supplement industry – These are obvious trolls which is a sign that the government is beginning to ‘prep’ the public for this inevitability. The government involved in any way is never a good thing - it will become a ‘racket’ and either prices will go up on everything and/or companies that make supplements will start to go out of business – regulation will also be used to minimize all competition against pharmaceutical companies. I personally rely on supplementing to keep off of all pharmaceuticals and over the counter medication and I absolutely do not want the government involved in regulating supplements – it won’t be regulating to get the bad supplements out to protect the public - it will be a way for the government to make a ton of money, they are the mob and they want their dues. So fight back against it for as long as you can.
title: BEWARE OF TROLLS

body: I've suffered from generalized anxiety, anxiety attacks and panic attacks for the past 25 years and this L-Theanine has all but stopped my panic and anxiety attacks. I still have generalized anxiety but it's lessened greatly. I take 2 of these every 5 hours during the day and have for the past several years and have had ZERO side effects. It's just something that "turns it all off" in my head - so that I can feel some peace. Yet I feel alert and not foggy or sedated at ALL. I liken it to having sat in a diesel truck that has a loud and rough idle (that's my normal state) and when I take these it's like someone turns the engine off and I can sit there in the solitude and hear the birds chirping. I have had panic and anxiety attacks while taking them but I went from one a day to one every few months - if that - only if the stress in my life increases past a tolerable point. I highly recommend this product to anyone suffering from anxiety of any kind and I plan to continue to take them the rest of my life. If there was a rating higher than 5 stars I would give it.
title: Saved me-can't live without them

body: I'm not sure why I get inconsistent results.  I have experimented how to take this.  I dont always drink matcha tea but last week I took this pill a couple hours after lunch with the tea and I had this blast of clarity and relaxation at the same time which I have never felt before.  I am neurotic and this is the first time I have ever felt like this without being drugged or sedated.  I wish could feel like that all the time.  took this in the morning on empty stomach with the matcha and no results.  I also tried with coffee and no results and with water and no results.  Definitely take this away from food and the only time it has amazing results is with matcha green tea with nothing else.  It has worked several times this way.  Today I tried it again BUT this time I had a grapefruit also, I barely felt it.  I don't know how anecdotal this is but it is worth a try in this combo.

body: On my first use of 150 mg. of Suntheanine during the day, I was dizzy, unfocused, and so drowsy that I could do nothing more than sleep it off, so I did.  It was too strong for me to use during the day, and took it only at bedtime.  I was able to sleep through the night without RLS pain, though woke up between 6:00-6:30 A.M. with mild RLS pain, which I would just walk off instead of taking another Suntheanine pill. After using Suntheanine only at bedtime for a period of just over one week straight, it made me groggy from the time I woke up until the time I took it for bedtime use. I decided to skip one day of taking Suntheanine, but was unable to sleep due to RLS pain, so chose to not skip a day of using Suntheanine.  After using for just over 2 weeks straight, I then developed adverse side effects.  I had severe irritability, depression, and a raging frontal headache.  I immediately stopped using Suntheanine and my adverse side effects went away within 2 days.  For 3 days now, I have not used Suntheanine at bedtime and was able to sleep through the night without RLS pain, but did have very mild RLS pain at my usual 6:00-6:30 in the morning time slot. I hope to permanently stop the use of Suntheanine, but will probably take again for the unpredictable, severe RLS episodes. Initially, Suntheanine helped my RLS, but in time, I had to stop using it due to adverse side effects. I now intend to use it only for the unpredictable, yet severe RLS episodes.
title: Used for RLS (Restless Leg Syndrome) - The Good, Bad, and the Ugly

body: This is a fantastic product. Now I can't say this is the best L-Theanine on the market because it is the only one I have tried. However, I have been using this product to combat my general anxiety and in that respect it has helped a lot. I read online that someone used this product instead of Xanax and they preferred it. I have used Xanax and this product and for me, Xanax is still a quicker and stronger solution to anxiety, but this product is still a fantastic way to combat anxiety especially if you take it on an empty stomach and with some coffee. I personally take this supplement twice a day, once in the morning with coffee and then once later in the day after I have started to digest lunch. I find that the product is less effective at night for me which may be due to me having a semi-full stomach.
title: A Fantastic Supplement That Combats My Anxiety Effectively and Inexpensively

body: Wonderful product! I take one in the morning on an empty stomach and the positive effects are definitely noticeable shortly after and continue for several hours throughout the day. I am now much calmer and focused than before taking this L-Theanine supplement. It works very well in conjunction w/ coffee or tea as it helps to keep any negative effects that normally come along with caffeine at bay. The Nutricost L-Theanine works very well and as far as I can tell is one of the best values on Amazon!

But Ambien can also play tricks with a person's judgement and memory and I knew I had to get off the stuff.
title: I typically get at least as good a night sleep as I did 30 years ago ...

body: I have only been using L-Theanine for a short time, but I am very pleased with the results. I recently returned to school and now find myself a full time student in my 40's. I would consider myself a 'pretty sharp' individual, but was experiencing anxiety and mental fatigue trying to keep up with the workload. A classmate introduced me to the concept of nootropics and offered me a three day sample 'stack' of Alpha GPC, L-Theanine, True Focus, and Huperzine A. The first day I felt more relaxed, but by the second day I felt 'in the zone'. That day I finished three days worth of assignments. It left a strong enough impression of me that I ordered all four suppliments. If you have any health issues whatsoever, I would recommend talking to your doctor first. Do your homework and learn about the effects of these supplements before you take them. But I would recommend NOW brands with no reservations.
title: L-Theanine is wonderful!

body: Just received this product today and it no longer contains Suntheanine. I ordered the same product a month or two ago and it was made with Suntheanine but it seems that they have stopped using it, despite what the product description says. Why this (potentially) matters: Suntheanine is the only L-theanine preparation known to be 100% L-theanine. Other preparations (likely this new formulation) may contain up to 50% D-theanine, a non-psychoactive isomer. Just a heads up from a disappointed customer.
title: Not the same formula anymore

body: I suffer from mild anxiety & depression that usually gets worse during the winter months. I started taking these, along with a few other natural supplements and they seem to help take the edge off and keep me calmish. Not sure if it's a placebo effect or not. But they're worth a shot. Probably wouldn't work very well for those of you with more severe anxiety. I definitely notice a difference when I don't take them though. Before social events or gatherings I like to take one of these and it makes me a little more talkative and relaxed. I have noticed a lift in my mood and a decrease in social anxiety. Good for first date/job interview/meeting new people nerves and I haven't experienced any negative effects if I take them before drinking.
title: Good for mild-moderate anxiety, takes the edge off

body: if it works for you great. if not try something else. it is what it is. NOW usually gives me quality supplements. Ive ordered over 5 different types of supplements from NOW. One including kava kava extract. and with this supplement it is important to label and to know the percentage of kavalactones. NOW does show atleast 30% kavalactones which is the main important active ingredient and purpose of kava kava extract. Other brands of supplements after doing thorough research reflect from 3-5% kavalactones and you need to take 3 capsules. which is horrible. yes you will find other supplements reflecting kavalactones with 30% or above but you will also see there price tag way above what NOW offers dollar$ per .mg. With that being said NOW chose the quality and still affordable route with there Kava kava extract. I only assume and guess that there other products match quality of one another.
title: if it works for you great. if not try something else

body: I purchased these with the original intention of hopping on the nootropic bandwagon, or drugs that naturally enhance mental function. I had read that by combining L-Theanine with Caffeine, you're supposed to feel more focused and be able to be more productive at work and other tasks. While I didn't notice it at first, after going off of it for a few days I noticed a huge difference. I recommend taking one of these with a large cup of coffee, and you'll definitely feel the boost. A lot of people report horrible brands of L-Theanine, but from my personal perspective, these tend to work. 200 mg is a little bit high, so just make sure that you drink at least 100-200 mg of caffeine to get the utmost effect. I recommend NOT eating these on an empty stomach.
title: Great For You Nootropic-ers.

My doctor used it as an add on for me for a while and I a, returning to it temporarily just to try and clear out any nastiness that could still be in my system because I am a physical mess and not sure what is going on.  Returning to what has worked in the past that I have no reason to believe is dangerous to revisit to try and build myself up like before.  Supplements, lifestyle changes  etc.
title: Returning to it for a tune up

body: I have been taking this nearly twice a day for a month now. I have had problems focusing in my college courses, while worrying about everything that needs to get done. I noticed a difference shortly after the first pill. It took my body a couple days to get used to, due to the noticeable drop in blood pressure. I take them before studying or an hour before a test. It helps me focus on what I am doing, without distractions of mind. I have no problem changing tasks when I choose to, I just have a hard time remembering what I was doing before because I am now focused on a new task. Don't worry, I am still able to recall most everything I studied for, just not short term. I am better at remembering short term and memory recall when I take this with Ginko. This new sense of calm has made me much more productive at everything I do. I am accomplishing more in a day and week than  I ever have before.

body: This product really works, and reduces stress, calms me down, and helps me sleep. I take 2 capsules daily, one in the morning around 11 AM, and another at dinner around 7-8 PM. Now that I have been on this product for awhile, I can say that it does reduce stress levels where I even notice it. When I take it, I feel in an hour or so like a washing over effect, not like drowsy or anything, but it washes over me and I can feel calm, like I can sit and read a good book or write something without worrying. I also have noticed when stress does rear its ugly head, my stress levels are more consistent and not all over the place, like when my brakes blew, sure I was stressed, but not as bad as if I was not on this.

body: LOVE this stuff!  I see now what other reviewers mean....the effects are noticeably "enhanced" when taken with a cup of coffee.  However, the coffee is not mandatory for it to work.  For example, 2 gel caps alone equals "all is well"......and 2 gel caps with a cup of coffee equals "it's a beautiful day in the neighborhood!"  That being said, fear not...this product does not produce drowsiness or feeling "out of it"....it just makes you feel calm and in control.  I cross checked this product for any dangerous interactions and found none, but it's always a good idea to do your own research, especially if you are on any prescribed meds.  Also makes dreams very vivid.  This is a natural ingredient found in green tea.  At this price, it is very much worth trying so that you can draw your own conclusions.  Best of luck to all, enjoy!

body: I am not the type to write reviews UNLESS I have total faith in what I have purchased. That being said, I absolutely love this product. I have been dealing with major anxiety for a few months now. I was always full or energy until the anxiety really started taking a toll. My boyfriend would tell me to go to the doctor so they could prescribe with Xanax or whatever unnatural prescription they would have given me, but I didn't want something that I could get addicted to and/or would change my personality. So I went to google for help. That's when I stumbled upon theanine. After reading countless reviews, I decided to order me one bottle. I wake up this morning feeling like I didn't sleep, had no energy, and not in the usual happy mood I'm always in. My package arrived today and I immediately took one. After about thirty minutes or so my entire mood lifted and my energy is back. I am a firm believer in this. The most important thing to me is that it's ALL natural. No bad chemicals are going into your body that could possibly cause future problems. If you have any type of anxiety, purchase this and I promise you won't be sorry.

body: I've been studying up on nutrition and supplements for a few years now, when I decided to finally drop the extra 50 pounds and get in shape. When family life began to get stressful (two children as well as working 12 hour overnight sifts), I started looking for natural supps that would help with stress/anxiety, as well as focus and motivation. The theanine came in the mail today, so I took two as soon as I woke up and opened the package. At first it wasn't very noticeable.... That is, until it was time to get the kids off the bus, get snacks and dinner ready, straighten up AND get ready for work all in the two hours after taking this supplement. One word... WOW. My normal stress levels are completely gone, my focus and motivation is sharp, and there's a pleasant sense of happiness and well being. Going to try this with a little bit of caffeine soon, usually coffee makes me jittery so hopefully the theanine will negate the anxiousness of caffeine. After only my first does, I can HIGHLY recommend this supplement.

body: My 8yr old has ADHD and sensory sensitivities. A busy classroom was overload for him, and a mild head injury on the playground made his symptoms worse. A small classroom still posed challenges with frequent time-outs due to frustration/tantrums, impulsivity, and so on. After reading that l-theanine had good results in a trial with 8-12yr old boys with ADHD, I started him on this supplement. Two weeks later, I received an email from his teacher:" I don't know what you are doing differently at home, but he is doing so much better these last two weeks, and he seems better able to use the tools we are teaching." For the first time he received 100% on a behavior chart, and his scores are consistently higher (upper 80's and 90's) than previously. He is able to choose to take himself to a quiet area when he feels overloaded, rather than acting out. At home, if I am late on his afternoon dose, I see impulsivity problems and obnoxious or oppositional behavior. 20-40 minutes later he is calm and better behaved. I have tried this myself, and there is no "drugged" feeling. It just supports better brain function if there is a need in this area, with no side effects. If your child can't swallow capsules, there is a suntheanine ( same thing) chewable tablet that tastes like citrus. We started with those with equally good results, although  you need two tablets for the same dose. I can't say it has been a total cure, but certainly has made life so much better for my son and the rest of us, without the concerns of medications. I recommend Daniel Amen's book Healing the Six Types of ADHD for additional suggestions of dietary and other supports for you or your child's particular symptoms. His other books on supporting optimal brain function also have good information. Managing ADHD isn't a pill, it is a lifestyle, but- wow- what a difference this makes!
title: Great for ADHD/sensory sensitive child

body: So, my engineer son notices this stuff among my collection of supplements and is impressed I am trying it. I have high blood pressure and this is one of the side benefits other than cognition and anxiety that this stuff addresses.  My son is a fan of the fact that it seems to help him focus on homework, which he has a lot of.  Offhandedly he mentions headaches as a possibility with taking too much of this and it hits me like a bolt of lightening.  I had been suffering from a low grade headache for a couple of days and I never have headaches.  I figured it was a lingering symptom of a recent cold.  I realized I had been taking 2 of these daily for a number of days.  I since have discontinued and it took 2 days for the headaches to go away.  To be sure, I take other supplements that may have enhanced this situation, melatonin and tryptophan, etc.  But, my word of caution is that I am a big guy and the 2 a day was too much for me, clearly.  As for anxiety and focus...not much of an impact for me...my daily run provides more relief than this stuff. As to NOW, I am pretty happy with their stuff, seems pretty consistent.
title: Careful with this stuff...

body: L-Theanine has helped me achieve a calm and focused state of mind. I began taking it along with l-tyrosine first thing in the morning with a glass of water. After a few days I noticed that in my early morning mental haze I gravitated toward the supplements even before I headed to the coffee pot. At the advice of my veterinarian, I began giving l-theanine to one of my dogs and my cat. The dog now responds more quickly to voice commands when we're out in the field or in the back yard. He sleeps more during the day. I gave him l-theanine, colostrum, and a soup bone filled with cheese, and he got through the latest round of neighborhood fireworks in his crate looking mildly concerned, but not alarmed, and not panicked like last year. On l-theanine, cat has gone from being completely crazy and unwilling to share the house with the dogs, to being irritable. With the addition of colostrum, he is now also often willing to be in the same room with the dogs. While I'm fine taking l-theanine capsules, my pets are not. BulkSupplements' pure l-theanine powder provides a larger dose with less volume, which has made it easy to hide the l-theanine in just a little bit of wet food - even easier.
title: L-Theanine the whole furry family can use

body: My wife has had severe insomnia for many years.  For some time she has depended on drugs such as zolpidem (generic Ambien) or others to get needed sleep almost every night.  For a few weeks now, with only two exceptions, she has been able to sleep with just L-theanine (2 x 500 mg) taken a while before bed time.  It is mostly believed to promote "relaxation without sedation."  It appears to be effective at this as well as reducing stress.  It is apparently not sleep inducing, but it probably helps my wife by decreasing anxiety and helping her to relax.
title: Has helped to allow sleep

body: I purchased L-Theanine to go with my BulkSupplement Caffeine powder. At first, I was a little skeptical purchasing from a company I've never heard of, let alone in pure powder form. Needless to say my experience has been great. I will break down exactly how I use L-Theanine (as well as quantity) in conjunction with Caffeine powder.
title: L-Theanine and it's benefits.

body: My new nickname for this stuff is now "the awesome sauce" because even on my first day taking it (which is today) I feel awesome! Shout out to BulkSupplements for yet another really good product. I ordered their caffeine pills which work really effectively but I'm starting to just come to terms that my body doesn't work well on caffeine but this stuff is a total different story. So most people say caffeine and l-theanine goes perfectly together and as I'm writing this I used both of them two hours ago and can see why they say that. Caffeine stimulants you while theanine calms you down and together they cause a really balanced, zen-like affect. Me personally, as I stated above, I think I can do without the caffeine and tomorrow I'm gonna take the theanine by itself and give my review on it separately but as of right now I can already tell this stuff is the real deal. I'm a very depressed person but this stuff makes me feel awesome. As I told my girlfriend, the supplement makes me feel like I drunk 50 cups of green tea and meditated for an hour straight! Very clear minded, calm and happy, yet focused and alert at the same time. For people like me who are depressed and people like my girlfriend who deal with severe anxiety, this stuff is the wonder drug. For others who don't deal with as much stress as we do can still benefit from it but don't expect a whole lot being that your demand for it isn't as high as ours but you will still feel the effects none the less. I can tell I'm gonna get a good amount of sleep later already. This stuff has me excited. Anyways let me cut this short, all in all this is a wonderful product and I recommend it to anyone, thank you for taking this time to read this and thank you to BulkSupplements for a clean effective product. Have a good day everybody ;)
title: The awesome sauce ;)

body: I've been using this for about a week. I got it to help with sleeping,... it does seem to work, boosting both sleep and focus. I kind of got it on a lark, I'd never tried it before. I wasn't obvious to me that something that comes from green tea would help with sleeping. There were lots of positive reviews so I decided it was worth a try. For me it seems to work great. I'd say it definitely promotes a calm focus affect.
title: This Stuff Does Do What It Does! ...and How the heck do I measure this stuff?

body: Despite many positive reviews of this product (across various brands, and on other internet sources and forums as well) I was still surprised at how well this worked.  I have always been overly sensitive to the effects of caffeine, such that instead of increasing my focus, a cup of coffee will cause racing thoughts and anxious jitters instead.  However, I often get inadequate sleep, so it's difficult to avoid caffeine altogether if I want to be awake at work. I started taking 200mg of this every morning and found the caffeine induced anxiety was significantly reduced. Without caffeine, it also seems to have some calming effects, albeit very mild (nothing like an anxiolytic such as xanax, but also way fewer negative side effects).
title: Lives up to its claim

body: I purchased this in the hopes of helping a dog with crate anxiety.  When I leave him, I  have an Adaptil diffuser plugged in not far from him and I always have lavender diffusing in the next room. This helps, but I always return to find  he has been drooling.  His mouth, throat and collar are always wet, along with some drool on the floor of the crate.  So I decided to try this. I put a little in his water and about 20 minutes before I leave, I put a little powder in a piece of bread. He's still not a fan of the crate, as he does bark at me until I leave, but no wet mouth/neck when I return.  Feet dry/floor dry.  This is been a godsend!!
title: Calming the anxious dog

body: Good product. My math professor said that he takes L-Theanine to keep his brain working fast  and efficient. And he was right. With L-Theanine I can concentrate on almost anything. I feel better and I also sleep better (however I am not sure that this is not a coincidence).
title: Excellent to keep your brain active

body: I have used the L-Theanine for a few weeks now and have had mild, but positive results. It has a slight but definite calming effect with absolutely no grogginess or dulling of thinking ability.  I use approximately 200 mg twice a day. I was so impressed with the results for me that I did some research on L-Theanine's use for dogs.  I have a slightly nervous dog who paces at night and just seems generally restless. She is healthy and happy otherwise, just a little nervous in general.  Apparently theanine has been used for many years in many dog anxiety medicines. I started giving my dog the dose recommended for her weight according the commercial dog meds and my vet. I just measure and sprinkle it on her food.  It took a couple of days to kick in, but she seems less restless and sleeps better at night. I highly recommend this product by BulkSupplements.  It was well packaged in a sturdy foil- lined package to keep it fresh.  I really have to trust the safety and purity to give it to my dog.  Pet lovers know exactly what I mean.  I highly recommend this product and the BulkSupplements company.  I will definitely purchase this product again through Amazon.
title: All good- no downside so far!

body: I started taking this every day because I heard that it would be good for anxiety - and it is. I have bad anxiety issues, and I take medication, but I still always have that "edge," particularly in the morning, I have terrible morning anxiety, mostly because I'm thinking of all the terrible things that could go wrong at work. Once I started taking L-Theanine, it was almost as though my morning anxiety had disappeared. I highly highly recommend this. I use it with Piracetam as well, which I have heard is quite popular (to use both).
title: ... every day because I heard that it would be good for anxiety - and it is

body: I purchased a 10 year old horse last year that needed a lot of rehabilitation.  It took the full year to get her legs, feet, and spinal structure back in order, but we had made very little progress with her PTSD from the past injuries and abuses.  She was like dealing with a pile of dynamite, ready to go off at any moment, very easily scared and  constantly on edge.  No matter how calm I was, it did not make a difference with her.  I did not feel that it was ethical to find her a new home in that condition, as she was dangerous, and I had been seriously injured by her spooking.  I got the inspiration to try the l-theanine for her, and she immediately relaxed.  She has only been taking it a few days now, but is a changed animal.  She is just short of 800 pounds, and I have been giving her 600 mg per day mixed into her feed, minus whatever she drops in the course of her sloppy eating.  So far, miraculous!  I have also ordered the rhodiola rosea 3% rosavin for her, and am waiting for it to come in.  I will also add this at 3000 mg per day.  Hopefully, I'll have my horse back.  So far, it's looking really promising.
title: Horsey miracle

body: This is the first product that I tried to purchase in bulk form and put in capsules myself. I decided to try L-Theanine because it is reported to help with sleep. I take quite a few supplements and the costs start to accumulate.  I read a post about buying in bulk and filling your own capsules and decided to give it a try. I used the Capsule Machine available on Amazon and size 0 gelatin capsules. I also purchased a small scale - American Weigh Scale Ac-100 Digital Pocket Gram Scale.  It is amazing that you can purchase a scale that weighs in milligrams for less than $12.00 delivered.
title: My first bulk supplement purchase. Excellent product. I plan to continue buying in bulk from BulkSupplements.

body: Just tried this new ( to me) supplement from my favorite company Bulksupplements. I have recently been experiencing serious  blood pressure issues. I lean toward health supplements to compensate instead of traditional pharmacological medications. Listening to my primary care MD I took the prescribed drug and if I wasn't a RN would have ended up in the ER. So today I supplemented with 1/16tsp L-Theanine with excellent results. Not much of a taste ( I mixed mine with ginger tea) waited the 40 minutes and my BP came down 20mm/Hg! And, my brain fog cleared up allowing me to think more clearly. My primary reason for elevated BP is stress/general anxiety.
title: Highly recommended for ANXIETY issues!

body: I mix about 200mg of this, the BulkSupplements Rhodiola Salidroside (especially make sure you get this one for ADHD related symptoms), and 200mg of caffeine a day before heading into work. It's very effective and has helped me supplant (not totally, but mostly) my pharmaceutical ADHD medication (I now only take those on rare occasion when I have tons of work to do). Day to day it's a great replacement. I'm a 37 year old attorney that has adult onset ADHD. Exercise, meditation and clean living helps greatly...but supplements like are also necessary and helpful for maintenance of ADHD and to give people focus while at work or life in general.
title: Great to Give Calm to my Focus

body: BulkSuppliments has always been the one GoTo company for my vitamins.  One has to remember that the bulky multivitamins are almost pointless when it comes to the body absorbing everything they have to offer.  The reason is that those vitamins contain such a concentrated form of the vitamin/suplement that the body cannot and does absorb it.
title: Make them prove to you that their product is the best out there

body: While I don't doubt the quality of Bulk Supplements, I was very disappointed to receive a 300 count capsule of L-Theanine that expires in June of this year (2017). It's a 500mg tab of L-Theanine, so really 1, MAYBE 2 caps per day, at most is what's needed. I have purchased several products from bulk supplements, this is the second time the expiration date has been an issue. I recall sending their customer service an email to no response regarding the previous time. I have probably bought from Bulk Supplements 8-12 times, so usually it's good, but frustrating when it's not! oh well.
title: Unaccepatble expiration date, given the "bulk" supplement quantity

body: I can't give as strikingly positive a review of L-Theanine as some others. Honestly, I "think" it helps to take the edge off, but am not sure. I add some sometimes in my smoothies, but mainly purchased it for a couple of my dogs who are very high strung and reactive. I believe it helps a little. It doesn't put them to sleep, and they are still reactive but I think it smooths things just a little bit. So, I would say if you're looking for a huge effect, this might not be the right product for you, but if you just want a smoother edge, this could work. That said, of the L-Theanine I've researched, this is a terrific product - I love that it's in bulk - very easy to add to dog food or smoothies. Since my smoothie is made in the blender it blends just fine. However it does not seem to blend well with water - in dog food - it kind of lumps up. But they eat it anyway.
title: I think it helps

body: I like the hygienic pouch that it comes it and the price was very reasonable. The product is a pure white fine powder that easily dissolves in water with a little shaking (it will clump up initially, but soon dissolves). Theanine is an abundant component of green tea but without tea's caffeine. At least one study has shown that theanine can offset the hypertensive effect of caffeine. But, check out this article in WebMD which suggests that theanine AND caffeine can help with thinking http://www.webmd.com/vitamins-and-supplements/theanine-uses-and-risks

body: L-Theanine is sometimes touted as effective for treating tinnitus.  Unfortunately, it did not help me. However, given that individuals who suffer from tinnitus respond differently to different interventions, some may find it effective.  Further, this is the best value in L-Theanine that I have found anywhere.  That said, the shelf life of the order I received (according to the "best before" date on the product) was half-way toward its expiry.  Since I had ordered enough to last more than one year, the product would have exceeded its best-before date before I had consumed all of it.  Fortunately, Amazon stepped up to the plate and refunded me one-half of the purchase price.  Kudos to Amazon.
title: Great value, but did not help my tinnitus

body: So here it is....I have suffered from anxiety (mostly panic attacks) and depression for over 10 years.  I have tried everything under the sun to find some relief, here is the short list:  Xanax, GABA, 5-htp, kava, tianeptine, Lexapro, and the list goes on.  Some have worked better than others but they all have given me unpleasant side effects.  I have done quite a bit of research on theanine but up until a few days ago had never tried it.  I can honestly say this has worked better for me than anything I have tried.  Since I have been taking it (a few days)  I have not felt the need to take Xanax or any other substance,  I haven't had any side effects (other than a dry mouth but that could be unrelated), I'm no longer emotionally numb and I don't feel even a twinge of anxiety.  I have been sleeping better too.  Due to differences in brain chemistry I can't say it will work for everybody but I can definitely recommend giving it a try.
title: Finally something that works!!!

body: This is the first time that I've tried taking the L-Theanine Powder.  I'd previously tried it in chewable tablet form and didn't feel a thing.  I ordered this in bulk after reading the glowing reviews, but was prepared to be disappointed again.  So I toke a small dose last night at bedtime along with the other pills that I take.  WOW!!!  I typically would have woken around 4:30 a.m. and would dose until 7:00 a.m.  Well, I still woke up around 4:30 a.m. and felt TOTALLY RESTED and happy to start my day.  And I woke up with a great mood, no anxiety, stress free.  So I took another dose in this morning and am here at work feeling very relaxed and very focused.  And I noticed that upon waking my chronic tinnitus is much, much less.  So I did some reading and discovered that Theanine is the precursor to GABA and is small enough to cross the blood brain barrier because it is a smaller molecule than GABA.  One has to take more GABA because of this.  The ONLY annoying thing is that suggested doses require a 1/16th, 1/8th or 1/4th size teaspoons.  However, this product is a keeper.  I am positively giddy with delight!
title: This Stuff Really Works!!!

The affects are subtle so if you are looking for a buzz this ain't for you either. I don't notice the affects really but after a few hours of studying I look up and realize wow I don't really feel like stopping like I use to every hour. Definitely a good products. For those who take extreme doses, you should really think about the pressure you are putting on your kidneys and liver. Just my two cents.

body: I am a medical student, and spend the majority of my time studying. I've been looking for a safe and natural way to boost my focus and attention span. BulkSupplements L-Theanine Powder was definitely the answer for me. Decades of research back up L-Theanine's synergistic effects with caffeine. It smooths the jittery alertness of pure caffeine into a steady focus, removing the anxiety that can accompany caffeine as well. A few studies to back this up: [...], [...], [...]. Theanine has been shown to improve focus, sustain attention, moderate fatigue, and improve reaction time in combination with caffeine. Obviously, these improvements do not turn you into a superhuman genius, but they are clearly detectable! I've had a great personal experience with the combination of BulkSupplements L-Theanine powder and caffeine. I've noticed I am more engrossed in my work and I can study a longer duration under the combination of L-Theanine and caffeine rather than just caffeine. I even had my roommate do a small test over two days, where one day he provided me flour in a capsule(which looks similar) and the next day he put bulksupplements l-theanine in a capsule, and I easily told him which day was which, without former knowledge. Obviously, that science isn't good enough for publication, but it was good enough for me!
title: Excellent Study-Aid with Caffeine

body: This is the first time that I've tried taking the L-Theanine Powder.  I'd previously tried it in chewable tablet form and didn't feel a thing.  I ordered this in bulk after reading the glowing reviews, but was prepared to be disappointed again.  So I toke a small dose last night at bedtime along with the other pills that I take.  WOW!!!  I typically would have woken around 4:30 a.m. and would dose until 7:00 a.m.  Well, I still woke up around 4:30 a.m. and felt TOTALLY RESTED and happy to start my day.  And I woke up with a great mood, no anxiety, stress free.  So I took another dose in this morning and am here at work feeling very relaxed and very focused.  And I noticed that upon waking my chronic tinnitus is much, much less.  So I did some reading and discovered that Theanine is the precursor to GABA and is small enough to cross the blood brain barrier because it is a smaller molecule than GABA.  One has to take more GABA because of this.  The ONLY annoying thing is that suggested doses require a 1/16th, 1/8th or 1/4th size teaspoons.  However, this product is a keeper.  I am positively giddy with delight!
title: This Stuff Really Works!!!

body: I mix about 200mg of this, the BulkSupplements Rhodiola Salidroside (especially make sure you get this one for ADHD related symptoms), and 200mg of caffeine a day before heading into work. It's very effective and has helped me supplant (not totally, but mostly) my pharmaceutical ADHD medication (I now only take those on rare occasion when I have tons of work to do). Day to day it's a great replacement. I'm a 37 year old attorney that has adult onset ADHD. Exercise, meditation and clean living helps greatly...but supplements like are also necessary and helpful for maintenance of ADHD and to give people focus while at work or life in general.

body: I have recently started using this product from Bulk Supplements and am VERY impressed so far!! I have pretty intense adult ADD and take Vyvance as needed to control the typical issues. THANK GOD FOR L-THEANINE POWDER BY BULK SUPPLEMENTS. I take my regular dose of 35 mg of Vyvance disolved in a water bottle with about 250 mg of L-Theanine. I sip this for the first hour of the day and within 1 hour I am feeling amazing. The L-Theanine allows me to still benefit from the Vyvance, but I don't get overly hyped up or shaky. I am calm but focused and have incredible mental clarity. I also notice the drop off effect of the Vyvance is much smoother. For those who have ADD and are on either Adderall or Vyvance.... stacking with a really good quality L-Theanine is working amazingly well so far. Please take the time to read about this combo and other products that Bulk Supplements sell like GABA, L-Tyrosine and DL-Phenylalanine (all of which are great for the right type of ADD) Read the book "Healing ADD" by author Daniel Amen. REALLY GREAT INFORMATION. See chapter 20 where Dr. Amen reviews proper use of supplements...then buy from Bulk Supplements. Seriously (I am not compensated at all for this review- Just honestly impressed). Of course everyone is a bit different with their own chemistry, etc. But this is worth a try for sure. I little experimentation with this quality product line is what it takes to dial in the right requirements for your brain. Excellent price too for powder too!!! Best of luck!!!

I usually use 1/8 tsp L Theanine with a cup of tea or half of a Jet Alert caffeine pill.  I took it on the day of my teacher evaluation and noticed a significant decrease in anxiety from past evaluations.  I also take it by itself at night for relaxation/sleep.  My sister now uses it for anxiety, especially in social situations.  I would have given it 5 stars if it came with a measuring scoop, as other brands seem to supply.  I really feel like each powder needs a dedicated scoop to discourage contamination, which I had to purchase separately.  The package isn't bad and actually stands up on it's own, but do be careful about spilling.  I will purchase it again.  I may get the 50% caffeine green tea powder to see how that stacks with this product for a better nootropic effect.
title: Great for anxiety and studying.

body: The jury is still out on this.  I was unsettled to learn it comes from China.  My husband refuses to try it because of that.  I used 1/8 tsp doses mid-day when I was stressed and didn't notice any calming effects, but I did notice I slept well the first night.  The second night after I took it midday, I couldn't keep my eyes open by 6 pm, so the next day I took it later in the day and I didn't get sleepy, but I slept OK.  I already take Trazadon and an over the counter sleep-aid to help me, and they don't always keep me asleep through the night so I thought the calming effects of L-Theanine might enhance my sleep.  But I'm still suspicous of the ingredients since it comes from China.
